analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x7c00b75a59fcb9d143ee93443e95751ef97d2dc9.sol:
	Contract VnbigToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x7c00b75a59fcb9d143ee93443e95751ef97d2dc9.sol#547-549)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
